title: [CTM]史诗级大型CTM冒险地图——Terra Restore2|大地复苏2——勇者，我们去拯救大陆吧

重置进度：Initial organization - 100% DoneCore map system - 100% doneLobby - 100% doneClasses - 100% doneIntro cutscene - 100% doneIntro town - 100% doneFirst dungeon - 0% donePlayer base - 0% doneOther systems - 95% doneTesting/tweaking/finalizing - 0% done
简介 English
 
Terra Restore 2 is a massive new 1.9 map in a new type of sub-genre, an adventure/CTM hybrid styled map. The map mixes the best elements of an adventure map along with a CTM map into a truly unique and awesome experience. You will travel the lands of Nira with your friend Exiel (an enderman) as you try to help restore the land and bring peace to it once more among the three types of species - humans, animals, and monsters. The map mostly has you in survival mode to give you ** on how you want to do things, however it also at times throws you into adventure mode to do various challenges and other things that you can't properly do in survival mode.If you want a map that breaks the mold of traditional maps and uses command blocks to a great degree to create awesome unique experiences then this is the map for you!
简体中文

    Terra Restore 2是一款全新的1.9版本地图，采用新型地图设计，即冒险/ CTM混合风格的地图。这张地图将冒险地图的最佳元素和CTM地图混合在一起，形成真正独特而极好的体验！你会和你的朋友Exiel（一个末影人）一起旅行倪拉这片大地，试图帮助他们恢复土地，并使三种物种 - 人类- 动物 - 怪物 - 和平生存下去。在地图中你大多处于生存模式，你可以做你想要的事情，但是这张地图有时也会让你进入冒险模式，去做各种各样的挑战和其他在生存模式中无法做到的事情。    如果你想要一张打破传统地图样式的地图，并在希望使用命令块来创造独特的极好的游戏体验，那么这是你想要的地图！

 介绍 English
Length: Roughly 3-6 hours of gameplay currently, 4/16 wools added
Difficulty: Easy mostly for the first part of the map but gets progressively more challenging
Players: 1-4 players (1-2 recommended) Boss fights and events - Each dungeon either ends in a boss fight or an event. The boss fights contain powerful monsters that have extra abilities controlled by redstone, have health bars, multiple difficulties, are not easily abused/cheesed, and more. Events throw an objective at you that you must complete such as defend a villager or survive 3 minutes. Bosses and events set you into adventure mode and also fully reset on death. They also scale slightly with the amount of players present.Restoration - You will receive a terra restore (wool block) at the end of each dungeon. On placing terra restores on the monument you will slowly start to restore the land around the area and bring it back to life. NPCs will start to pop up and you can generally find some nice loot and useful things in the restorations.Challenges - Roughly mid way through each dungeon there will be a challenge area which contains a chest with pretty decent loot at the very end of it. Getting to the chest is the hard part though as the challenge could contain parkour, puzzles, time elements, waves of monsters that you have to get past and such. Much like bosses/events, challenges set you into adventure mode.Music - Every area in the map has a song attached to it and so do the bosses. The music repeats and will help you immerse yourself in the map.Story - Fantasy setting with character development and cut scenes. Prequel to Terra Restore 1 and the setting involves the 3 groups - humans, monsters, and animals trying to strive for equality and peace even though they are very different from each other. Some groups of monsters don't agree with it so there is some conflict in various places around the world of Nira.Essence currency system - Each monster you kill gives you essence. Essence can be used to purchase upgrades for your base, buy items from shops, and more! You lose some essence on death.Base upgrades - You can upgrade your base with a disco dance floor, enchantment tower, kitchen, and more! Each of which has it's own practical use.Towns - Intersections now also have towns in them which will often contain NPCs, minigames, inns, shops, and the likes. Monsters don't spawn while in such areas so they are pretty safe!Horses - To help you travel through out the overworld you get access to some horses which are also upgradable.Overworld - Connects all the towns and areas together.Keep Inventory - You don't lose your gear on death.Rare gear - Gear is a lot harder to find which makes exploring way more worth it.Uniqueness - This CTM map is very unique in comparison to the other CTM maps out there and I strive to make it high-quality.Fun factor - Definitely a lot of fun on multiplayer and will have you wondering what is next.


简体中文

长度：大约3-6小时，增加了4/16个羊毛
难度：由简到难平滑过渡
玩家： 1-4名玩家（建议1-2） BOSS战和事件 - 每个副本都以BOSS战或剧情的结束而结束。BOSS战包含强大的怪物，由命令控制的额外技能，更高的血量，极具挑战。在剧情之中会向你引出一个任务，你必须完成如 保卫一个村民3分钟 等的任务。BOSS战和事件会让你进入冒险模式。他们的难度会随着玩家数量的增加而改变。大地回复 - 你将在每个地牢结束时获得一个大地回复（一个羊毛）。在纪念碑上放置羊毛时，大地回复将开始恢复该地区周围的土地，使其恢复生机。NPC会定居于此，你通常可以在回复的建筑中找到一些不错的战利品和有用的道具。挑战 - 通过每个地牢中会有一个挑战区域，在挑战的最后会有相当不错的战利品。挑战可能包含跑酷，解密，一波又一波的怪物，你必须通过这些挑战。与BOSS战和剧情相同，挑战会让你进入冒险模式。音乐 - 地图上的每个区域都附有一首音乐，BOSS战也是如此。音乐会自动循环播放，它会让你获得更好的游戏体验。剧情 - 丰满角色以及世界观设定。大地复苏2是大地复苏1的前传，涉及3个物种 - 人类 - 怪物和动物，尽管他们有着诸多差异，但仍力求平等与和平。但有些怪物喜欢战略，他们在倪拉大陆上引发了很多战争。Essence - 当你杀死怪物，你将获得Essence。它可以升级基地，购买物品等等！当你死亡，Essence会扣除一部分。基地升级 - 您可以升级您的基地，或解锁如迪斯科舞台，望远镜，厨房，等等设施！每一项升级或解锁都很实用。城镇 - 每个路口现在会有城镇，其中包括许多NPC，小游戏，旅馆，商店等。怪物不会在这样的地方生成，所以NPC很安全！马 - 为了帮助你更快的赶路，你可以骑着马儿赶路，他们可以在很多地方由系统生成。大地图 - 连接所有的城镇和地区的地方。死亡物品不掉落 - 地图中死亡物品不会掉落(但是经验会清空)。稀有装备 - 它们隐藏在各个地区的各个角落，非常难找！与众不同 - 这个CTM地图与其他CTM地图相比是非常独特的。趣味因素 - 如果您和您的朋友联机游玩这张地图，您会发现多人游玩会更有趣！

更多内容请看下方评论区置顶

常见问题 
#1.为什么我和我的小伙伴们联机游玩的时候我有音乐而他没有？

答：请检查您的好友有没有安装本地图的材质包，如果没有请在你的地图文件夹下找到一个压缩的r开头的压缩文件，把它发送给您的朋友，即可。


#2.为什么在地图中有些乘船的骷髅无法攻击人？

答：MC1.9的bug，请无视。


#3.为什么我在床上睡觉会起不来？

答：MCbug，重启游戏即可。


#4.恶魂那边为什么一直坑我经验？

答：MCbug，请无视。


#5.重置版本会在多长时间内完成？

答：作者没有明确指出。

补充中.........

replies.txt_content: 厉害到没朋友的建筑
为什么我一到开始的大树那里游戏就崩溃了？？

replies.author: 天佑酱
replies.txt_content:
2647343660 发表于 2018-6-27 19:52
为什么我一到开始的大树那里游戏就崩溃了？？
请先查看您的游戏是否有添加MOD，如果有，请使用原版游玩，如果还是不行，建议把视距调小，建议6~12.毕竟这是一张非常大的地图

replies.author: 天佑酱
replies.txt_content:
简单点！ 发表于 2018-6-25 15:50
厉害到没朋友的建筑
其实地图的指令部分才是真的强。举个例子，本地图的“无法封印的刷怪笼”是全球首创，而那个穿染色皮革甲的骷髅，和灰烬山那个有技能的僵尸，都需要非常长的命令，所以Mithey真的非常强
